title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 666.10 - Penalties and enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 666.10 - Penalties and enforcement

State Regulations

Any person who violates the act, this Part or any order
issued by the department pursuant to the act or to such regulations may be
liable for all penalties and other remedies provided for in the Environmental

Conservation Law. Such penalties and remedies may be in addition to any other
penalty or remedy available under any other law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
666.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
